chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart) (u : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> x <> z -> cA (I m x u p) k z = cA m k z

Premises:
prec_I = fun (m : fmap) (x : dart) => x <> nil /\ ~ exd m x : fmap -> dart -> Prop
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
point = (R * R)%type : Set
Md0.k = zero : dim
tag = nat : Set
planar_I : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_I m x -> planar (I m x t p)
eq_genus_I : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap (I m x t p) -> genus (I m x t p) = genus m
cA_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z
cA_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z
cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
cA_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA m j z
A_not_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> A m k x <> cA (B m k x) k x
succ_pred_clos : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil
cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z <> nil -> exd m z
cA_cA_1_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) j z = cA_1 m j z
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z
not_exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA m k z = nil
cA_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
cA_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
succ_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
cA_cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z) /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z <> nil -> exd m z
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z

```coq
intros m k x z u p Hinv HpIx Hxz.
unfold cA.
destruct (eq_dart_dec x z) as [Hxz'|Hxz'].
- rewrite Hxz'. auto.
- assert (Hprec_I_m_x : prec_I m x) by (unfold prec_I; split; auto).
  assert (Hinv_m : inv_hmap m) by auto.
  assert (Hplanar_I_m_x_t_p : planar (I m x u p)) by (apply planar_I; auto).
  assert (Hgenus_I_m_x_t_p : genus (I m x u p) = genus m) by (apply eq_genus_I; auto).
  rewrite <- Hxz'.
  unfold cA.
  destruct (eq_dart_dec x z) as [Hxz''|Hxz''].
  + rewrite Hxz''. auto.
  + auto.
Qed.```

original: intros m k x z u p Hinv HpIx Hxz. unfold cA. destruct (eq_dart_dec x z) as [Hxz'|Hxz']. - rewrite Hxz'. auto. - assert (Hprec_I_m_x : prec_I m x) by (unfold prec_I; split; auto). assert (Hinv_m : inv_hmap m) by auto. assert (Hplanar_I_m_x_t_p : planar (I m x u p)) by (apply planar_I; auto). assert (Hgenus_I_m_x_t_p : genus (I m x u p) = genus m) by (apply eq_genus_I; auto). rewrite <- Hxz'. unfold cA. destruct (eq_dart_dec x z) as [Hxz''|Hxz'']. + rewrite Hxz''. auto. + auto.
